metadata.title: USN-5762-1 -- GNU binutils vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GNU binutils incorrectly handled certain  COFF files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5762-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  binutils-dev - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-multiarch - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-for-build - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-multiarch-dev - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-for-host - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 libctf-nobfd0 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-i686-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-doc - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 libctf0 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-source - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-common - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 libbinutils - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 binutils - 2.38-4ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
